text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Trump’s winning numbers:

48,676 gun deaths and counting
554,000 COVID-19 cases and counting 
16.8 million unemployed and counting 
$1.9 trillion budget deficit and counting
$24 trillion national debt and counting
Making America Go Away (MAGA)
